0101111011110110 1010100010101101 1 -> sum: 0000011110100100, cout: 1
0011110100100110 0011101111001100 1 -> sum: 0111100011110011, cout: 0
1000010110001110 0110110011110000 0 -> sum: 1111001001111110, cout: 0

0010111010100000 0101000101001101 1 -> sum: 0111111111101110, cout: 0
1010000000110111 1111100000110001 1 -> sum: 1001100001101001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
